ComicInfo.Series: Hellboy: Makoma, or, a Tale Told by a Mummy in the New York City Explorers’ Club on August 16, 1993
ComicInfo.Summary: Makoma, or, a Tale Told by a Mummy in the New York City Explorers’ Club on August 16, 1993 [Part 1]: While socializing at The New York City Explorers' Club, Hellboy is entranced by a mummy who relates a tale of the great African hero Makoma.
ComicInfo.Title: Makoma, or, a Tale Told by a Mummy in the New York City Explorers’ Club on August 16, 1993 [Part 1]
